item.title: Raichur DC launches Jyoti Rath Yatra as district festival celebrations begin
item.description:
<![CDATA[Union Budget 2026 Highlights, India Rejects Pak Allegations, Precious Metals Rates Dip And More
Pic: The Jyoti Rath Yatra, organised as part of the ‘Ede Dore Nadu Raichur District Festival–2026', was launched on Feb 1 in Raichur amid festive fervourRaichur: The Jyoti Rath Yatra, organised by the district administration as part of the Ededore Nadu Raichur District Festival–2026, was launched on Feb 1 amid festive fervour in the city.The Rath Yatra was flagged off by deputy commissioner Nitis...]]>

item.title: Raichur DC launches Jyoti Rath Yatra as district festival celebrations begin
item.description: <![CDATA[Pic: The Jyoti Rath Yatra, organised as part of the ‘Ede Dore Nadu Raichur District Festival–2026', was launched on Feb 1 in Raichur amid festive fervourRaichur: The Jyoti Rath Yatra, organised by the district administration as part of the Ededore Nadu Raichur District Festival–2026, was launched on Feb 1 amid festive fervour in the city.The Rath Yatra was flagged off by deputy commissioner Nitish K from the historic Karnataka Sangha premises, which wore a celebratory look from the early hours o...]]>
